publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5346 Mr Tom McCabe: Custodial Sentences and Weapons (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Custodial Sentences and Weapons (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure— (a) charged on the Scottish Consolidated Fund; and (b) payable out of that Fund for existing purposes, in consequence of the Act.

S2M-5346 Mr Tom McCabe: Custodial Sentences and Weapons (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Custodial Sentences and Weapons (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure— (a) charged on the Scottish Consolidated Fund; and (b) payable out of that Fund for existing purposes, in consequence of the Act.

S2M-5346 Mr Tom McCabe: Custodial Sentences and Weapons (Scotland) Bill: Financial Resolution—That the Parliament, for the purposes of any Act of the Scottish Parliament resulting from the Custodial Sentences and Weapons (Scotland) Bill, agrees to any increase in expenditure— (a) charged on the Scottish Consolidated Fund; and (b) payable out of that Fund for existing purposes, in consequence of the Act.
